name: TollDNS
description: DNS readiness checks + points ledger for AI WebAdmin free-tier activation.
changelog:
0.1.2

  • Added signed ingest endpoint for paid-toll visitor events so domain owners can earn TollDNS points automatically.
  • Added ingest shared secret + owner reward settings in TollDNS admin.
  • Added 24h paid-toll metrics to points summary and settings dashboard.
  • Added duplicate event guard (event_id) to reduce replay/double-crediting risk.
